component.title: Elasticsearch
component.description: The elasticsearch component is used for interfacing with ElasticSearch server.
component.label: monitoring,search

client.description: To use an existing configured Elasticsearch client instead of creating a client per endpoint.

clusterName.description: Name of cluster or use local for local mode

clientTransportSniff.description: Is the client allowed to sniff the rest of the cluster or not (default true). This setting map to the client.transport.sniff setting.

consistencyLevel.description: The write consistency level to use with INDEX and BULK operations (can be any of ONE QUORUM ALL or DEFAULT)

data.description: Is the node going to be allowed to allocate data (shards) to it or not. This setting map to the node.data setting.

indexName.description: The name of the index to act against

indexType.description: The type of the index to act against

ip.description: The TransportClient remote host ip to use

pathHome.description: The path.home property of ElasticSearch configuration. You need to provide a valid path otherwise the default $user.home/.elasticsearch will be used.

port.description: The TransportClient remote port to use (defaults to 9300)

transportAddresses.description: Comma separated list with ip:port formatted remote transport addresses to use. The ip and port options must be left blank for transportAddresses to be considered instead.

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
